title: Output Schema for postRecordStagingTable Operation
description: Output schema for the postRecordStagingTable operation in the ServiceNow connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the postRecordStagingTable operation.

result.description: The created staging record in ServiceNow.

staging_table.description: The name of the staging table.

transform_map.description: Information about the transform map used.

headers.description: HTTP headers from the ServiceNow API response.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the response.

Location.description: The URL of the newly created staging record.

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the response.
